column4: hey guys, jaunty comes with ATI drivers 8.x but ait released 9.6 for jaunty.. a few questions.. anyone here using the new drivers and is there a good difference, performance wise?, and if so, its a .run file , how do you install a .run file on jaunty?
anyone have any experience good or bad doing this?
here are some basic instructions on installing the ATI drivers.  its written for 9.3 but i'm sure it applies to 9.6 should those be available as well http://blog.klauskiwi.com/archives/24
